33 extern uibutton_t *uibuttons[];
34 extern const int uibuttons_count;
35 
36 PROCESS(uibuttons_process,uibuttons_process);
37 PROCESS_THREAD(uibuttons_process)
38 {
39  static etimer_t et;
40 
41  PROCESS_BEGIN();
42 
43  UIBUTTONS_INIT_ALL();
44 
45  etimer_start(&et, TIMESTAMP_TICKS_PER_SEC/50, PROCESS_THIS(), PROCESS_EVENT_TIMEOUT, NULL);
46 
47  while(1)
48  {
49  PROCESS_WAIT_EVENT_UNTIL(etimer_expired(&et));
50 
51  do{
52  UIBUTTONS_POLL_ALL();
53  etimer_reset(&et);
54  }while(etimer_expired(&et));
55  }
56 
57  PROCESS_END();
58 }
59 
60 
61 
62 
63 
64 void uibuttons_process_init(void)
65 {
66  process_start(&uibuttons_process,NULL);
67 }
